description: This file defines an Angular standalone component named 'LinkComponent' that renders a styled link or button with flexible navigation or action behavior. It supports navigation via URL, routerLink, or acting as a button to trigger events.

classes.name: LinkComponent
classes.description: An Angular component providing a stylized link or button that can act as navigation or trigger an action.

methods.name: onKeydown
methods.description: Handles keyboard events to allow pressing Enter or Space to activate the link/button when in action mode.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles click events or button activation, emitting the 'clicked' event unless disabled.
